title: Drawing, "Design for Mechanical Furniture: Secretary Desk", ca. 1805
medium: Graphite, pen and ink, brush and watercolor on paper
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Design for a secretary desk with a fall-front on hinges, and cabinets above and below. Elevation at left with desk open, revealing the inner compartments. At lower left, detail of construction, section through top. At right, side elevation, showing construction details.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Mechanical Furniture: Secretary Desk", ca. 1805.
ca. 1805. Graphite, pen and ink, brush and watercolor on paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1911-28-494.
